caption.p: Cytotoxic activity of M. Paniculata essential oil and β-caryophyllene in 3T3 fibroblasts and Hepa 1c1c7, a human hepatoma cell line using the MTT assay. Data are presented as percentage of cell death from three independent experiments. Camptothecin was used as positive control. Different letters correspond to significant difference ( p < 0.05); CPT: camptothecin.
